
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xuxing-l/p/18749676" title="发布于 2025-03-03 23:50">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">pikachu搭建</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<a id="pikachu靶场搭建教程"></a><h1>pikachu靶场搭建教程</h1><p>下载小皮面板phpstudy：</p><p>小皮官网：<a href="https://www.xp.cn/" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.xp.cn/</a></p><p>下载pikachu : <a href="https://github.com/zhuifengshaonianhanlu/pikachu" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/zhuifengshaonianhanlu/pikachu</a></p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936537-226675690.png"></p><p>安装完小皮，双击打开，如上界面启动Apache和MySQL服务，打开浏览器访问：127.0.0.1</p><p>出现如下界面，说明站点创建成功</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936650-2054094928.png"></p><p>pikachu靶场配置：官网下载压缩包</p><p>解压缩将文件名改为 pikachu 放入网站根目录（E:\phpstudy_pro\WWW）</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936602-1492504338.png"></p><p>打开E:\phpstudy_pro\WWW\pikachu\inc 目录下的config.inc.php修改为下图</p><p>将mysql用户名和密码修改为root</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936681-874220022.png"></p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936672-1841624684.png"></p><p>在小皮中的网站创建网站，创建一个新网站配置根目录需要为</p><p>靶场文件夹存放目录（我的是：E:\phpstudy_pro\WWW\pikachu）</p><p>然后这个域名你喜欢啥填啥就行，端口-- http，端口号你填一个不常用的即可</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936595-1194918951.png"></p><p>都弄好了以后，打开浏览器访问你的 (域名加端口号/install.php)</p><p>我的是 pikachu:8081/install.php</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936694-1878963482.png"></p><p>点击安装/初始化即可</p><p><img alt="fig:" src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3591014/202503/3591014-20250303234936639-707969331.png"></p><p>点击这里，开始你的学习之路~~~</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
